mapper.select: select a.num_iid, CAST(sum(a.pv) AS signed) pv, CAST(sum(a.uv) AS signed) uv, ifnull(CAST(sum(a.product_cart_increment) AS signed), 0) as cartNums, CAST(sum(a.product_collector_number) AS signed) as collNums from voyageone_bi_source.bi_bt_spider_product_${channelId} a where a.cart_id = #{cartId} and (#{staDate} <= a.process_date and a.process_date <= #{endDate}) group by num_iid limit #{oIdx},#{oLimit}
